derivation: from H4110 (מַהֲלָל) and H410 (אֵל); praise of God;
outline:
Mahalaleel = "praise of God"
  1. son of Cainan and the 4th in descent from Adam in the line of Seth
  2. a descendant of Perez, the son of Judah
strongs_def: Mahalalel, the name of an antediluvian patriarch and of an Israelite
